div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Technology Update: We are working diligently to support our teachers and students during distance learning.

To clarify the previous information. If you believe your device is in need of service due to damage, please email sc.support@sc.k12.mo.us. We work on a case by case basis to resolve your issue. If we determine you will need a replacement device, you may exchange your device on Monday, Wednesday, or Friday between 8:00 and 11:00 am by appointment only. If you do not have access to email, please call 573-676-5225 ext. 2000 and provide your name and phone number where we can reach you to discuss your issue.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.strong: SC Greenhouse - Plants will be available from 11am to 5:30pm this week depending upon the weather. We still have a great selection.
Payment will be online - SC Greenhouse Purchasing SchoolPay

div.data-code: <center><iframe src="https://www.facebook.com/plugins/page.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2FSouth-Callaway-R-II-School-District-1438420289760609%2F%3Fref%3Dhl&tabs=timeline&width=400&height=500&small_header=true&adapt_container_width=false&hide_cover=true&show_facepile=false&appId" width="400" height="500" style="border:none;overflow:hidden" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowTransparency="true" allow="encrypted-media"></iframe>

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.p: By implementing the Core Academic Standards the South Callaway Staff is committed to developing leadership and instructional skills to assure that all students discover and utilize their full talents and potential to become leaders and to take responsibility for their own destination.

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.p: SchoolMessenger is a notification system that the district is using to send out Alerts, School Closings, Sport Notifications, etc. It can call your home phone and cell phone, send SMS text messages, and send emails.

The phone numbers and email addresses being used were submitted on the school enrollment form at the start of the year. If at any time during the year you have a change to this information, please notify your child’s building office.

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.p: To ensure the safety of all kids, all food items for birthdays, seasonal parties, or special occasions must be store bought and/or individually packaged. We strongly encourage that all food items be free of nuts and a food label be available. Thank you for your support to keep all students safe.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.em: The South Callaway R-II School District does not allow discrimination or harassment against employees, students or others on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability, age or any other characteristic protected by law. Discrimination or harassment is strictly prohibited in accordance with law.
